pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Kipp| ![kipp](https://s3.laisky.com/uploads/2019/06/nolan-comic-ft.jpg)| :---------------------------------------------------------------:| Humanistic Utilities[![versions](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-v0.2.9-blue.svg)]()[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/kipp.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/kipp)[![Commitizen friendly](https://img.shields.io/badge/commitizen-friendly-brightgreen.svg)](http://commitizen.github.io/cz-cli/)---[Github](https://github.com/Laisky/kipp/tree/master/kipp)## DocumentTBD---## InstallRun:```sh$ pip install kipp```
